scripts.build: npm run build:packages && rm -rf dist/js && APP_VERSION=v$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && sed "s/__APP_VERSION__/$APP_VERSION/" service-worker.js > service-worker.build.js && npx terser service-worker.build.js -o service-worker.min.js && rm service-worker.build.js && rollup -c
scripts.test: npm --prefix packages/recipe-nesting run build && node tests/dones-worker.test.mjs && node tests/price-helper-map.test.mjs && node tests/recipe-nesting-map.test.mjs && node tests/recipe-nesting-cycle.test.mjs && node tests/recipe-nesting-guildupgrade.test.mjs
scripts.build:packages: npm --prefix packages/recipe-nesting run build && npm --prefix packages/recipe-calculation run build
